title: 举报这几人有刷分嫌疑
author: zjy
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zjy 于 2013-8-18 14:58 编辑 

首先是：474645956 (UID: 213734)与gwt8462(UID: 100095)的相互加人气证据：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-105209-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-105513-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-105569-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-105576-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-106097-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-115507-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-120845-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-120847-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-120850-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-120944-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-121106-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=151399&page=1#pid2735547http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=151420&page=1#pid2735846http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=151420&page=1#pid2735846http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=148544&page=1#pid2676203还有很多。而且474645956 (UID: 213734)在有些加分后的注备都说加分，你懂得还有他们加的分日期也差不多在同一个时间还有gwt8462(UID: 100095)与Coerce二號(UID: 304717)也有刷分嫌疑：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=155922&page=2#pid2829209http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=154372&page=1#pid2805463http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=154255&page=1#pid2793006http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=154218&page=1#pid2792373http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159775&page=3#pid2915877http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159639&page=2#pid2915367http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159623&page=2#pid2919467http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159932&page=1#pid2916029http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159775&page=3#pid2915952
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-161485-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-159359-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-157342-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-156046-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-154333-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-154474-1-1.html而且这个gwt8462(UID: 100095)说的报恩是刷人气吗？或许还有很多 我也不可能说全部找出来DeadlyDnB (UID: 264988)和James10086(UID: 248126)也有刷分嫌疑：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=161072&page=1#pid2941166http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=160898&page=1#pid2937158http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=160869&page=1#pid2936455http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=160794&page=1#pid2936300http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=69533&page=15&ordertype=1#pid2936402http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=158763&page=1#pid2889635DeadlyDnB (UID: 264988)可能是Coerce二號(UID: 304717)的马甲
James10086(UID: 248126)与Coerce二號(UID: 304717)以及他的小号有刷分嫌疑：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=157316&page=1#pid2857284http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=157788&page=2#pid2869715http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=69533&page=77&ordertype=1#pid2866859http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=157880&page=1#pid2869678http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=153607&page=11#pid2869694http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=158584&page=1#pid2885127http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=154556&page=10#pid2857226http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=69533&page=903&ordertype=1#pid2060914http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=160008&page=1#pid2919562http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=160120&page=1#pid2919545http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159996&page=1#pid2919519http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=160116&pid=2919481http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159910&page=2#pid2916024http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=160071&page=1#pid2919506http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=159775&page=3#pid2915952我相信还有很多 我没能一次性找出搜集了1个多小时的证据 并不能一次全翻出来 不过请管理员明鉴 如果是事实请严惩我相信论坛还有很多这样的人 本来是找到一个的 不过渐渐发现关系网 一次性全部都发现了经真实gwt8462(UID: 100095)与Coerce二號(UID: 304717)和James10086(UID: 248126)三人相互刷分James10086(UID: 248126)是gwt8462(UID: 100095)小号
